channel.title: CVE Feed for Skyhigh Security -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Skyhigh Security -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4400|2024-09-25T15:19:09.095Z -- skyhigh%20security -- skyhigh%20secure%20web%20gateway%20%28swg%29
item.description: A password management vulnerability in Skyhigh Secure Web Gateway (SWG) in main releases 11.x prior to 11.2.14, 10.x prior to 10.2.25 and controlled release 12.x prior to 12.2.1, allows some authentication information stored in configuration files to be extracted through SWG REST API. This was possible due to SWG storing the password in plain text in some configuration files.
